pullrequest.title: Clarify state of support for custom physics engines

content.raw:
> We're working on a solution and it's good to know this is important for users.

‌

Yes, I think that easy to develop custom physics engine support is the major feature for which users in my domain \(haptic teleoperation, humanod robots balancing, walking or flying : \) \) are interested in when I explain about what Ignition Gazebo is. See for example also the discussion in [https://github.com/leggedrobotics/raisimLib/issues/40](https://github.com/leggedrobotics/raisimLib/issues/40) .

‌
content.html:
We're working on a solution and it's good to know this is important for users.

‌

Yes, I think that easy to develop custom physics engine support is the major feature for which users in my domain (haptic teleoperation, humanod robots balancing, walking or flying : ) ) are interested in when I explain about what Ignition Gazebo is. See for example also the discussion in https://github.com/leggedrobotics/raisimLib/issues/40 .
